channel.title: Server Downloads section is diguisting
channel.description:
[center]There has been a few threads throughout the past few weeks that have nothing related to server downloads, or releases.
Most of them asking for help.
I feel as if there should be much more strict moderation in that section, I'd like to hear what all you guy's have to say about it, I feel like it's getting a bit ridiculous and needs controlled..
Here's a screen shot of an example of what's going on over there.
[img]http://i.minus.com/jMBl17mpxcyvZ.jpg[/img]
Thanks for reading - Mr Arrows95[/center]

item.title: Server Downloads section is diguisting
item.dc:creator: @Ashley3 Ashley
item.description:
@Ashley3 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:22, topic:472591”][quote author=Si Force link=topic=590394.msg4179097#msg4179097 date=1355317442]
It’s funny really, because I rarely see anybody reporting such threads in the download section.
[/quote]This. I don’t think any mod has the time to devote to just looking at the downloads section to find rule breaking topics anymore. If you want something taken care of, report it![/quote]Well get some sectional moderators in there that are always active in that section.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Downloads section is diguisting
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket

@Team_Rocket wrote:

Ruby:

I have something against helping lazy people though.

This is the biggest problem I have with the Server Help section.

item.title: Server Downloads section is diguisting
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:18, topic:472591”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=590394.msg4179344#msg4179344 date=1355343622]

The Server Downloads board is a place where no-one with half a braincell should be going in the first place. Server Help and Server Downloads is a no go. Definite no go.

So you’re against helping people?
[/quote]
No, if you take a look at the website development board you’ll realise I help everyone who asks in there. That doesn’t bother me, it’s when there’s already 10 topics about that same subject but people would rather post a new one than go to an already solved topic by use of a search engine.

Christ I have nothing against helping people, not at all. I have something against helping lazy people though.[/quote]

Okay, now I understand.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Downloads section is diguisting
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I’m not really aware of this since I only take care of reports for my sections, because I don’t receive reports from sections I don’t moderate. If you see something in the Downloads section that is inappropriate, just report it. There’s no need to create a thread about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Downloads section is diguisting
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

I agree with you to a certain extent. I do believe we should have a few sectional moderators for the download(s) section because of all the nonsense that has been going on lately, such as; requests, re-releases, etc. However, if the current mods ‘step-up’ we could somewhat have control over the section. I’m not trying to be a dick or anything, I know the mods have a lot to take care of, forum-wise, and I get that but the download section will eventually become flooded with useless releases (which is something we obviously don’t want).

Are you all (the staff team) considering more sectional moderators?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Downloads section is diguisting
item.dc:creator: @Ashley3 Ashley
item.description:
@Ashley3 wrote:

Ashley for Sectional Moderator.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Downloads section is diguisting
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Si Force:

It’s funny really, because I rarely see anybody reporting such threads in the download section. Unfortunately I don’t really get the time to visit every section and look at every thread like I may have done in the past, but I do check the reports daily. If you report it, it’ll get dealt with.

I report them all the time, usually its taken care with but right now theres 5 reposts leeched and like 3 requests

Read full topic

item.title: Server Downloads section is diguisting
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

t4:

who cares. stop centering your posts.

Lol’d

I think the people actually looking for server downloads are going to go to that thread, see someone requesting, hit backspace, and keep going. There are plenty of good Moparscape members in the community that’ll report a post like this, to get the attention of moderators. That’s the best you can do, I do think a bit of extra moderation would be nice there, though.

Read full topic
